Class SimpleNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openntf.formula.ast.SimpleNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node, ASTNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ASTAssignment, ASTAtConCat, ASTAtDo, ASTAtDoWhile, ASTAtEval, ASTAtEvalEx, ASTAtFocEval, ASTAtFor, ASTAtIf, ASTAtIfError, ASTAtIsAvailable, ASTAtIsError, ASTAtReturn, ASTAtSort, ASTAtText, ASTAtTransform, ASTAtWhile, ASTFocNormalText, ASTFocParam, ASTFunction, ASTGetVariable, ASTSelect, ASTSubscript, ASTUserDefinedFunction, ASTUserDefinedFunctionDef, ASTUserDefinedFunctionParameter, ASTUserDefinedFunctionVariable, ASTUserDefinedInclude, ASTValueDateOrKW, ASTValueDouble, ASTValueInt, ASTValueList, ASTValueString

    public abstract class SimpleNode
extends java.lang.Object
implements Node
